description: Present AC consolidation review BEFORE finalizing. Identify similar ACs, ask domain expert questions, wait for user confirmation.

do.description: Present AC consolidation questions and wait for answers
do.content: CONSOLIDATION REVIEW: These ACs use same logic? [List ACs] → User answers → Apply decisions

dont.description: Don't automatically consolidate ACs without user confirmation
